body:
Well, recently I was being teased by a couple of people on Nebula. I told them many times to stop but they kept going. I reported them about 3 ish times, all separated by like 5 minutes, but no moderator came. The thing is, We need more moderators. I understand that our current moderators are trying their best and I love them for that, but we need more moderators. I just cannot stand these damn people breaking the rules and getting away with it. Especially when it is teasing me. No hate please, and do not start any flame wars or anything about this. I am not hating on the staff at all, I love the staff a lot, they are a big part on what makes Avicus Avicus, but we need more staff.

-CrafterPete1013

title: Community Problems.

replies.body:
1. F2
2. Click on Player reports on the website
3. File an online report.

Seriously, I'm not hating you; but think outside the box. Staff have a life, and we have other reports to go to.

replies.body:
The "player reports" section isn't there for esthetics. You can easily take screenshots with f2, gyazo, or anything else you could really think of.

Dont take this to offense, but filing complaints to an issue that can be solved quite simply on your own isn't very... I can't find the right word ._. You get the picture.

Although I will say this... very little mods still do their jobs correctly, nonetheless do their job at all. I'm happy with these new interviewees. A lot of them are pretty active on the server.

I feel like this issue's gonna be solved pretty easily over the next month or so.

replies.body: Ya i agree. Avicus does needs more mods cuz of Avicore but a new batch is coming up though. Its the quality over quantity that counts. Also, we can't expect the mods to do all the work. They have worked so hard to keep this community safe and fun. A community should help each other and work together. We should also do our part by recording/screenshotting these rulebreakers if we have the chance to do so because we need to help as well.
